title: La Chakra Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, International, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant connected to a small health food store. Menu includes some vegetarian food and a few vegan options. Has fresh fruit juices, vegan desserts, organic chocolates, gluten, sugar, and wheat-free desserts.
streetAddress: Av Mariano Sanchez Fontecilla 534, Las Condes
